aboutRight.aboutText: Hello there! I'm a self-taught frontend developer passionate about creating seamless user experiences. My personal blog delves into developer-related topics, and you can catch my contributions on freecodecamp, openreplay, and pieces. As a self-taught developer, I deeply value community support, and I actively contribute to open-source projects as a way of giving back.

archivement.text: Join me in shaping the future of frontend development, where my dedication to user-centric design and continuous learning propels me forward. Let's build together and make a mark in the dynamic world of digital experiences!

aboutRight.note:
“Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.”
- Cory House

one.title: Frontend Developer & Technical Writer
one.subTitle: Koii Network (Remote, Canada)
one.text: Authored high-quality technical tutorials, enabling developers to build applications on the Koii Architecture.

one.title: React Developer
one.subTitle: Subsocial (Remote, Ukraine)
one.text: Collaborated with the core team members of Subsocial to improve the UI of the Subsocial dapp and add new features to SubId.

two.title: Frontend Developer
two.subTitle: Loctech Nigeria
two.text: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to develop Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) applications for leading engineering service companies in Nigeria.

two.title: Jr Frontend Developer
two.subTitle: Zebullon Network
two.text: Built landing pages for SMEs to increase the conversion of their offerings.

skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.text: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, Reactjs, Nextjs, Redux, Sass, Tailwind, Antd, Material UI, Bootstrap, Styled Components.

skills.title: Others
skills.text: Netlify, Vercel, Git, Responsive Web Design, SSR, Framer Motion

contactData.text: Let's Connect and Create! Your feedback and collaboration are the keystrokes to innovation. Reach out and let's build something amazing together. 🚀

contactForm.title: Got Ideas? We have got the skills. Lets team up.
contactForm.text: Tell us more about yourself and what you are got in mind.
